member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources._1_1___WelcomeScreen
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Welcome to 'Battle of the Texts', a text based game made by Matt and Will.
==========================================================================
Here you will enter the world of Raen, a world ravanged by decades of war.
Do you have what it takes to save Raen.
You can click 'start' to begin
or
Click 'lore' to read up on everything that's happened so far..

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources._1_2___Lore
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to .

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources._2_1___Intro
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to (NExt button to 2.2) The world is foggy around you, yet you dont notice. Objects materialize around you, yet nothing seems wrong. Your suddenly at your home, in your bed, this doesnt seem odd to you.
Sitting up, you look around, "Today's the day." you realise, this is when you head to the Capital. To join the other Chosen, to fight the Shadows. You take a step to the door, opening it, light floods around you.
.

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources1._0_1___Sleep
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to You sleep in your cot for a few hours, regaining some of your heath and stamina.
+24HP
Standing up, you enter the arena....

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources1._0_2___CantSleep
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You're not tired enough to sleep, maybe you should go fight something..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to wefsdfadgg.

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources1._2_1___Intro
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to (NExt button to 2.2) The world is foggy around you, yet you dont notice. Objects materialize around you, yet nothing seems wrong. Your suddenly at your home, in your bed, this doesnt seem odd to you.
Sitting up, you look around, "Today's the day." you realise, this is when you head to the Capital. To join the other Chosen, to fight the Shadows. You take a step to the door, opening it, light floods around you.
.

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources1._2_2___Travel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You back in and our of lucidity for the next hour, glimpsing briefly the forest, waking for a moment to see parts of the plains beyond. You wake up fully, a splitting headache nearly knocks you back into unconciousness, after a few moments, you look around, and notice that the scenery have changed from the foresst you were at, becoming rocky and barren..

member.name: P:WpfApplication1.My.Resources.Resources1._2_3___Arrival
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to (WIP)
Entering a downward pass in the mountains, you can notice the shadow getting releived, obvious you're getting close to your destination. Up ahead, you see a large, circular building, large mobs of humans and other creatures gather outside.
As you get closer
The bookie stares at you expectingly...
=========================================
What is your name?.
